Eric Schmidt , in his new role as executive chairman, will focus on broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership, according to Google's announcement. He'll also serve as an advisor to Page and Sergey Brin , although he sent a Twitter message today saying that`` day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed.''
